data.title: Local current time of Himachal Pradesh, India, Asia
data.meta_description: Find the current and exact local time of Himachal Pradesh, India, Asia, the sunrise and sunset time and the corresponding time zone.
data.text:
What is the time zone of Himachal Pradesh, India? The answer is Asia/Kolkata.

The current time of Himachal Pradesh, India has a difference of 5.5 hours compared to the Greenwich Mean Time zone (GMT) at a longitude of 0 degree.

Geographic coordinates of Asia/Kolkata

Latitude: 22.53333

Longitude: 88.36666

Sun relative's information

The following informations are estimates of the appearance and disappearance of the upper edge or upper limb of the Sun circle. They are based on the sunrise and sunset of the time zone's geographical coordinates. As the land is not always regular, it's practically impossible to get the exact time of the viewer's sun vision.

Sunrise

The sun will rise at 05:12:22

Solar noon

Sun will reach his highest point at 11:41:37

Sunset

18:10:53

Sunshine's hours

12:58:31
